message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is worth more than $12000 to us. Considering its unique features and benefits, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you for a special introductory price of $15000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget. In order to meet in the middle, I would like to propose an offer of $13500 for the product. This allows you to save some money while still securing a great deal on our premium product.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm glad we're finding common ground here. To further accommodate your needs, I would like to propose an offer of $13000 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise while still ensuring a good return for us.
I appreciate your latest offer, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'm willing to pay $12800 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your financial constraints and am willing to negotiate further. I propose an offer of $12900 for the product. This price allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while still being competitive in the market.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'm willing to pay $12700 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I'm glad we're making progress. I'm willing to offer the product at a price of $12800. This price not only meets your budget considerations but also ensures a satisfactory return for us.
